Spotlight on Brazil: Mexico team profile.
Mexico are football's great underachievers, a country crazy for "the beautiful game."
Where huge crowds flock to see the national team...
...and yet they so nearly missed out on a 2014 World Cup place.
El Tri won the football gold medal at the 2012 Olympic Games,...
...but needed the USA to beat Panama with a late goal...
...on the final match day of World Cup qualifying to secure a playoff with New Zealand.
